docs: Constructor that initializes the contract
name: new

docs: event emit when a deposit is made
events.name: Deposit

docs: Transfer the contract admin to the accoung provided
name: transfer_ownership

docs: Return the total balance held in this contract
name: balance_of_contract

docs: As owner, withdraw tokens to the given account. The destination account can be the same
as the contract owner. Some balance must be left in the contract as subsistence deposit.
name: withdraw

docs: flip the status of contract, pause it if it is live
unpause it if it is paused before
only contract owner can call this function
name: flip_contract_status

docs: return the fee required
name: tier_deposit

docs: change the tier fee given the tier id and new fee
Must be the contract admin to call this function
name: change_tier_fee

docs: Change tier limit given tier id and a new limit
Must be contract admin to call this function
name: change_tier_limit

docs: Returns the account balance for the specified `account`.
Returns `0` if the account is non-existent.
name: balance_of

docs: Return the tier id corresponding to the account
name: tier_id_of

docs: Return the tier limit corresponding the account
name: tier_limit_of

docs: Receive payment from the participating DDC node
Store payment into users balance map
Initialize user metrics map
name: subscribe

docs: Return the list of all DDC nodes
name: get_all_ddc_nodes

docs: Add DDC node to the list
name: add_ddc_node

docs: Check if DDC node is in the list
name: is_ddc_node

docs: Removes DDC node from the list
name: remove_ddc_node
